EDIT: To the people upvoting the first post in this thread: Warrior lost it's armor pen, Last Whisper lost it's armor pen against squishies (approximately 30 against the average ADC's base armor) only to have 10 armor pen added to an item that most Assassins don't even build. Armor penetration was severely nerfed in this update, not buffed.
